text: Mu by’ukuri, Allah ntaterwa isoni no gutanga urugero urwo ari rwo rwose n’iyo rwaba urw’umubu cyangwa ikiwuruta. Ariko kuri babandi bemeye, bamenya ko ari ukuri guturutse kwa Nyagasani wabo, mu gihe abahakanye bavuga bati " Allah yariagamije iki mu gutanga uru rugero?" Aruyobesha benshi akanaruyoboresha benshi; kandi nta bandi aruyobesha batari inkozi z’ibibi gusa
